annotations.description: Today's game was very poor. There weren't many thrilling moments. There wasn't any significant dominance by either side in this game. The home team played long ball football unlike the away side who attempted to hold onto the ball for as long as possible.

annotations.description: Oleksandr Shovkovsky comes off his line to intercept the corner from Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli). Napoli get a corner.
Dries Mertens (Napoli) serves up a nice cross, but the defence clears the danger. The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to Napoli.
Dries Mertens (Napoli) fires a brilliant shot from the edge of the box, but the effort rattles the right post! It could have been a superb goal.

annotations.description: Maurizio Sarri has decided to substitute Marek Hamsik (Napoli) and he is replaced by .
Marek Hamsik (Napoli) strikes from the edge of the box, but hits it really poorly and sends the ball way over the bar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli) takes the corner, but he overhits it and none of his teammates are able to reach the ball.

Dries Mertens (Napoli) collects a brilliant pass inside the box and finds himself in a goal scoring opportunity. He takes a shot, but the effort is well blocked by one of the defending players. The referee signals a corner kick to Napoli.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Denys Garmash (Dynamo Kiev) gets a yellow card. The referee William Collum made the right call.
Sergiy Rybalka (Dynamo Kiev) latches on to a precise pass on the edge of the box, but miskicks his shot and the ball goes high over the bar. Poor effort!
Flag up against Andriy Yarmolenko (Dynamo Kiev). He had space to move into behind the defence, but he went too soon.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Viktor Tsygankov (Dynamo Kiev) sends in the corner, but fails to find the head of any of his teammates, allowing the defence to clear.
Viktor Tsygankov (Dynamo Kiev) produces a dangerous lofted cross into the box which is intercepted. Now Dyn. Kiev have a corner.
Vitorino Antunes (Dynamo Kiev) sends a teasing cross into the area, but Pepe Reina intercepts the ball.
The foul by Arkadiusz Milik (Napoli) was seen by William Collum who didn't hesitate to blow the whistle.
The defence had a hard time blocking out the strike from Arkadiusz Milik (Napoli). He didn't hesitate and finished from outside the box right after he had received a pass from his teammate.
A pass by Domagoj Vida (Dynamo Kiev) ends up in no man's land, and the attacking effort comes to an end.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Referee William Collum blows his whistle to start the second half.

So far we have been witnesses to an entertaining encounter between these two teams. Let's hope there will not be a decline in the spectacle in the second half. There wasn't any evident superiority by either side during the first half. The home side are playing 'kick and rush' football, which is the exact opposite of the away team who are making a lot of passes and attempting to maintain possession.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The end of the first half.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Arkadiusz Milik (Napoli) gets to the rebound in the goalmouth and plants a header home.
Dries Mertens (Napoli) plants a goal bound header towards the top of the net after a nice cross inside the box, but one of the defenders manages to deflect it away.
Denys Garmash (Dynamo Kiev) seems to be alright and is okay to carry on.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 1 min. of stoppage time to be played.

Dries Mertens (Napoli) tries to send a pass but it's blocked.

Marek Hamsik (Napoli) blasts the ball from just outside the box, but his attempt is blocked by the defender.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: It's in the back of the net! Faouzi Ghoulam sends a superb cross into the box. Arkadiusz Milik (Napoli) latches on to it and from near the penalty spot powers a header into the roof of the net, leaving Oleksandr Shovkovsky beaten. He displayed his eye for goal there excellent finish. The score is 1:1.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Andriy Yarmolenko (Dynamo Kiev) decides to speed play up with a short corner kick.
Andriy Yarmolenko (Dynamo Kiev) sends a beautiful cross into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence manages to clear the ball to safety. Corner kick. Dyn. Kiev will have an opportunity.
Jose Callejon (Napoli) passes the ball from the edge of the box in order to find his teammate, who is in a good scoring position, but the defender blocks the pass and spanks the ball to safety.

Viktor Tsygankov (Dynamo Kiev) manages to beat his opponent to the ball, but he commits a foul in the process.
Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli) fails to pick a body out in the box with an over hit chip pass.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: GOAL! Viktor Tsygankov meets a cross inside the box and heads the ball across the goal, where Denys Garmash (Dynamo Kiev) lurks and pokes it into the back of the net. 1:0.
Arkadiusz Milik (Napoli) and Dries Mertens try to prise open the opposition with a series of short passes, but one of the defenders steps in and puts an end to the move.
Andriy Yarmolenko (Dynamo Kiev) takes a mid range free kick and fires the ball into the stands. His effort flew well wide of the right post and it's going to be a goal kick.
Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli) commits a rough foul. William Collum stops the game and makes a call. Free kick. Dyn. Kiev will probably just try to cross the ball in from here.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Andriy Yarmolenko (Dynamo Kiev) launches an inaccurate corner kick into the penalty area.

Sergiy Rybalka (Dynamo Kiev) unleashed a monstrous piledriver. He controlled a pass, glanced up at goal and shot from the edge of the box. It could have been a difficult one for the keeper, but the ball fortunately hit one of the defenders and ball bounced away. The ball goes out of play and Dyn. Kiev have been awarded a corner kick.
Marek Hamsik (Napoli) slides a pass forward, but one of the defenders cuts it out.

Hello to all football fans, we are here to bring you a live commentary of the following match, describing all the most interesting and important moments. We'll make sure you won't miss a thing, so just sit back and have fun.
